adn.heroSubtitle: The values and commitments that drive us since 2001

identite.label: IDENTITY & VISION
identite.title: A brand born in 2001
identite.text: Soup & Juice is a fast-food chain that places flavour balance at the heart of every dish. Our mission: to support your daily nutritional intake with healthy, tasty and varied options.

pillars.title: What eating at Soup & Juice really brings you
pillars.intro: Three fundamental pillars for your wellbeing

qualite.label: QUALITY & KNOW-HOW
qualite.title: Homemade recipes
qualite.text: Our dishes are selected for their nutritional qualities. Complete and balanced recipes, they are prepared in our kitchens by teams who work every day close to the products to guarantee freshness and taste.

engagements.title: OUR COMMITMENTS
engagements.subtitle: Values that guide each of our actions

jus.title: Fresh & natural juices
jus.text: Our fruit and vegetable juices are fresh, without HPP, without preservatives, without pasteurization and without additives.

soupes.title: Vegetarian soups
soupes.text: All our soups are vegetarian and 90% lactose-free.

emballages.title: Sustainable packaging
emballages.text: 80% of our packaging is recyclable or compostable. Vegetable starch straws, reusable cutlery kits and reusable crates.

local.title: Local & solidarity
local.text: Production in Yvelines and short-circuit supply. We support and initiate actions in favor of associations.

forme.title: FITNESS
forme.intro: More stable energy, all day long.
forme.body: At Soup & Juice, our dishes are built to support the body, not tire it. We combine proteins (lentils, chickpeas, eggs, chicken), fibre-rich vegetables, grains like quinoa or basmati rice, and good fats (olive oil, seeds, nuts).
forme.bullet3: more consistent energy, without excess or heaviness
forme.tagline: We nourish the body intelligently, to stay in shape in real life.

regime.title: DIET
regime.intro: Rebalance your diet without giving up pleasure.
regime.body: Our recipes are naturally suited to diet or rebalancing phases. Portions are right-sized, dishes are complete, and ingredients chosen for their nutritional density. Plant fibres, satiating proteins, spices like turmeric or ginger, natural sugars in fruit: everything is designed to eat better, more consciously, without frustration.
regime.tagline: A diet that fits into everyday life and can last.

sante.title: HEALTH
sante.intro: Cuisine that respects the body's balance.
sante.body: For over 25 years we have favoured raw, varied and digestible ingredients. Seasonal vegetables, pulses, grains, herbs and spices are used to support digestion, nutritional balance and overall wellbeing. Our recipes avoid unnecessary excess and rely on simple, effective combinations known for their benefits.
sante.tagline: Because good nutrition isn't theory. It's daily practice.

allergens.legend: ● = allergen present in the recipe (or compound ingredient).

legal.editorContent: WHATEVER (SAS) — 54 avenue Kléber, 75016 Paris. SIREN: 439 077 462. Publication director: WHATEVER.
legal.serverLocationContent: Servers are hosted in the European Union (EU) region, in compliance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
legal.ipContent1: Site content is protected by copyright. Unauthorised reproduction is prohibited.
legal.ipContent2: Personal data: Privacy policy. Cookies: Cookie policy.
legal.ipContent3: French law. In case of dispute, French courts have jurisdiction.
legal.dataControllerContent: WHATEVER (SAS) — 54 avenue Kléber, 75016 Paris. SIREN: 439 077 462. Contact: contact@soup-juice.fr
legal.dataCollectedContent: Contact form data (name, email, message) and browsing data (cookies). Purposes: respond to your requests, improve the site, legal obligations. Legal basis: consent and legitimate interest.
legal.durationContent: Retention: 3 years for contact requests, max 13 months for cookies, 10 years for accounting data if applicable. Recipients: WHATEVER team and technical providers. No sale of data to third parties.
legal.rightsContent1: Access, rectification, erasure, limitation, portability, opposition: contact@soup-juice.fr or by post to the address above. Response within 1 month.
legal.rightsContent2Before: You may lodge a complaint with the
legal.whatIsCookieContent: A small file placed on your device when you visit the site, used to remember preferences or analyse browsing. It cannot damage your device.
legal.cookiesUsedContent: Strictly necessary cookies (site operation), possibly analytics cookies. Maximum duration: 13 months. You can refuse or delete cookies via your browser settings (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge: Privacy / Cookies section).
legal.cookiesRightsContent1: You can at any time change your preferences or withdraw your consent for non-essential cookies.
legal.cookiesRightsContent2: Contact: contact@soup-juice.fr — WHATEVER, 54 avenue Kléber, 75016 Paris.
legal.siteUseContent1: Access to the site is free. The user agrees to use it in accordance with the law and these Terms. Prohibited: illegal use, infringement of intellectual property, unlawful content, disruption of the site.
legal.siteUseContent2: Site information is indicative. Content (text, images, logos) is protected; unauthorised reproduction is prohibited.
legal.dataCookiesContent: Personal data: Privacy policy. Cookies: Cookie policy.
legal.applicableLawContent1: French law. In case of dispute, French courts have jurisdiction. WHATEVER reserves the right to amend the Terms; continued use constitutes acceptance.
